casebody.data:
Elaine DAMIANAKIS, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Nikitas Damianakis, Appellant,
v.
PHILIP MORRIS USA, INC.; American Tobacco Company; Patricia A. Balistreri; Brooke Group Holding Inc. ; Brooke Group Ltd., Inc.; Brown and Williamson Tobacco Corporation; James N. Conlin; Harold W. Jones; Georgia A. Kelly; Michael L. Kelly; Liggett and Myers Tobacco Company; Liggett Group, Inc.; Liggett Group LLC; Vector Group, Ltd., Appellees. Case No. 2D16-3367 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed March 9, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
